summary:
Features, Full Physics, Fit this outfit perfectly to all UNP bodies, all Sevenbase, all UNPB, Demonphet, Seraphim, Top Model, DG, and many many more.
Everybody, Everytime, and Everywhere in game with Racemenu Morph Support
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]UUNP Cassandra Frost Witch Slider [/size][/b][/center]

[size=4]
[/size][center][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653][u][color=#0066cc]Cassandra Frost Witch Outfit Unp [/color][/u][/url]was designed and textured by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Nsk13[/size][/color][/u][/url][/size][b]"

The meshes here are Re-Mastered by "[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]" to give the end-user a form fitting outfit for all body types in the UUNP System.

Tools used by "[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc]gamefever[/color][/u][/url] [b]"
[/b][color=#0066cc][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][/color][b] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Caliente[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Ousnius[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]
Blender
Nifskope
Meshrigger[/b][/center][b]
[/b]

[b][u][size=4]Features
[/size][/u][/b]
Fit them to any UNP variant, UNPB variant, Sevenbase variant, Demonfet, Saraphim, Top Model, Dream Girl, Venus....50 bodies all perfectly everytime each time.
Full Physics Weight Painting
No Clipping
Skin Tight Leggings, Hosery, and Undies
Racemenu Morph Support
Make any type of UNP body variant in seconds without any fuss.
Slide the outfits to fit any UNP body in  Bodyslide or Slide it in real time in game with Racemenu Morphs Pluggin
Slide your favorite outfit today with total confidence that it will work everytime with a Gamefever UUNP slider.
[size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]Requirements

[/u][/size][size=3]Bodyslide Outfit Studio 2.0 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]Racemenu  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?
XPMS Extended (for Morph menu in game and skeleton of course) [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]Physics XML (in Files under options, has enabled femalehead.nif no more havoc object for you my friend)
[/size]

[size=4][b][u]Installation
[/u][/b]
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573][u][color=#0066cc]Nsk13[/color][/u][/url]'s original mod here [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/][size=4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/[/size][/url][size=4]?
[/size][size=3]
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
[/size][color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Robe [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Hat, Skirt [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11767/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP by Backsteppo[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Cloak [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Legwraps, Bracers [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?][u][color=#0066cc][size=4][i]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/i][/size][/color][/u][/url]
[color=#ebf1dd][size=4][i]Boots [/i][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36393/?][i][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]UNP High Heels by Petrovich[/size][/color][/u][/i][/url]




[size=4][b][u]Want more sliders by [/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b][u]? Go here

Gwelda Sliders[/u][/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68608/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68608/[/u][/url]?
[size=4][u]Merta, Sotteta, and Tembtra Sliders[/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68670/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68670/[/url]?
[u][size=4]Cassandra Frost Witch Slider[/size][/u]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68748/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68748/[/size][/url][size=2]?
[/size][/size][size=4][u]Want to see more mods by me?
[/u][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977/?tb=mods&pUp=1]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977/?tb=mods&pUp=1[/url]#
[size=4][u]Immersive First Person Combat Item Fix [/u][size=2](fix Wardrobe malfunctions for good)[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68776/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68776/[/size][/url][size=2]?[/size]

[/size]




[center][b][u][size=4]What Others have said about my Slider Sets
[/size][/u][/b]
[size=2][i]"First of all, thanks for taking your time to make this, i know how much work this is [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]" T3hoth3r

"Hey man! Just wanted to let you know I downloaded your latest version, installed and it works like a charm! Thank you for your hard work! it really shows!"  J450n[/i]

[i]"OMG this is so AWESOME !!!!!!!!Thanks for working so hard to make these they work perfectly in BS and in game.
Thank you [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img] "[/i][/size][i] [size=2]JQdude[/size]              

"First of all thanks for doing all this fantastic work. I haven't been able to find any clipping at all. I stand in awe because most of my own UUNP conversion projects end in a clipping disaster." Melanch

[/i][size=2][i]"Ha - The savior of my day.  Thanks, man - again!" Nermal_66

"Mate, I love your sliders. Just downloaded them all. Can't wait for the other, especially for Emfy. Fully endorsed." Slowyoa 

"Top quality work. Thank you kindly!" Dabrienni

"Thanks to you I've now got one of the very best armor collections all nicely merged and working flawlessly with RaceMenu morphs. Great effort, thanks for sharing." B3ast1e
"[/i]so much quality UUNP stuff in such short time. how long would it take you to convert rickerhk's Remodeled for SeveNBase? two weeks? [img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img]
just kidding. i'm greatful for every UUNP set. it's just the better bodyslide body." YPS

"Thanks again, GF! You da bess!" Jtenma

"Thanks so much!" Mazzyfireball


[size=4]Thank you for all the wonderful comments these are the things I read when the work gets tough.



[/size][/size][size=2][size=4]But Don't take our word for it, here's the opinion of a famous You Tube Personality[/size] (Factual Opinion Pending)
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68670-1-1439492071.jpg[/img]
[s]"Tight Fit"[/s] That's not what your thinking.


 
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68670-0-1439492071.jpg[/img]
Form Fitting, you know that landing an Imperial Star Destroyer there isn't going to happen.[/size][/center]
author: Gamefever

files.changelogHtml: Due to severe tiredness, I had uploaded the wrong backup work data, more than once, and even reworked the chest piece twice.
